directions: mix the milk powder with baking powder and cornflour
add the whisked egg by the spoonfull and mix till u get a wet workable dough
make small balls and keep aside
heat the milk in a saucepan. add the sugar and elaichi powder. once it boils, lower flame to a simmer and add the milk balls. cook till the balls increase in size and take off the heat.
garnish with almond and pista slivers and serve chilled
title: rasmalai
